txt.en: 'I can help you pick a path to the best fishing pools, [placeholder]. Just stay close and do not stray. I might not be able to help you fight, but I do have a knack for finding relics.'
'I hope you are not tired! There are still more pools to fish from tonight. Follow me, and keep up!
'Are you ready to move to the next pool? Follow me closely, and I will lead you there now.'

'You are quite the fisher-[placeholder], [placeholder]! And a warrior also -- I would be happy to scout these parts with you any time you want it. You have quite a talent for hooking the lost valuables. I hope your catch will be of great use to you.'
'Come along, [placeholder] -- there is no time to waste! The next pool is this way. Oftentimes, there are rather menacing turtles in that area, but hopefully they will not be there.'
The avanc have been slain; it is now safe to fish
'Let us keep moving, my friend. The night is not growing any younger, and I would like to dry my feet before the sun comes up.'
Collected a soggy Relic of Strength
'Are you ready to travel back to Galtrev? I will have you there before you can snap your fingers. Come, follow me.'
The turtles are gone, and it is now safe to fish
You have collected a muddy Seal of Patience
Collected a glinting Relic of Inner Fire
You have defeated the slugs; you may now fish in peace
Collected a worn Relic of Time

Many valuable relics of old were lost in a battle that took place long ago in the Dunbog. It is often said that night-time fishing excursions will produce ancient and wonderful gems that enhance powerful items.
The bog-lurkers have been cleared away, and you may now fish in peace
Collected a dripping Relic of Cunning
Talk to Franis
Defeat all of the slugs
Fish up a worn Relic of Time
Talk to Franis
Defeat all of the bog-lurkers in this area
Fish up a dripping Relic of Cunning
Talk to Franis
Talk to Franis to continue through the bog
Defeat the avanc at the first pool
Fish up a soggy Relic of Strength
Follow Franis to the turtle-guarded pools
Defeat each of the turtles
Fish up a muddy Seal of Patience
Talk to Franis
Defeat all of the elhudan around this pool
Fish up a glinting Relic of Inner Fire
Franis is waiting for you in the Dunbog.\n\nYou should speak with Franis.
Avanc circle the pools in which a soggy Relic of Strength might be found.\n\nYou should defeat the avanc so that you can fish in peace in the pools.
A soggy Relic of Strength can likely be found in the nearby pools.\n\nYou should use your fishing skill to try to snag a relic.
Franis is waiting for you to speak with him again.\n\nYou should talk to Franis; his knowledge of the Dunbog will steer you to the most promising pools.
The turtles roam the pool that Franis led you to.\n\nYou should defeat the turtles that romp in this area so that you may fish in peace when all is done.
A muddy Seal of Patience can likely be found in the nearby pools.\n\nYou should use your fishing skill to try to snag a relic.
Franis is waiting for you to speak with him again.\n\nYou should talk to Franis; his knowledge of the Dunbog will steer you to the most promising pools.
Elhudan circle the pools in this area of the Dunbog, casting their fell light upon your wary faces.\n\nYou should defeat all of the elhudan in this area.
A glinting Relic of Inner Fire can likely be found in the nearby pools.\n\nYou should use your fishing skill to try to snag a relic.
Franis is waiting for you to speak with him again.\n\nYou should talk to Franis; his knowledge of the Dunbog will steer you to the most promising pools.
Slugs slither around the pools to which Franis has led you.\n\nYou should defeat all of the slugs of this area before you attempt to fish here.
A worn Relic of Time can likely be found in the nearby pools.\n\nYou should use your fishing skill to try to snag a relic.
Franis is waiting for you to speak with him again.\n\nYou should talk to Franis; his knowledge of the Dunbog will steer you to the most promising pools.
Franis has led you to a pool that is surrounded by menacing bog-lurkers.\n\nYou should defeat all of the bog-lurkers so that you may fish in peace.
Instance: Glinting in Forgotten Pools
A dripping Relic of Cunning can likely be found in the nearby pools.\n\nYou should use your fishing skill to try to snag a relic.
Franis is waiting for you to speak with him again.\n\nYou should talk to Franis; his knowledge of the Dunbog has steered you successfully to the most promising pools.
